activities.title: 3DAgentWorldLab 研讨会 2024
activities.description: 我们实验室举办了年度研讨会，分享最新的研究成果和未来方向。来自多所大学的研究人员参加了此次活动。
activities.description_en: Our lab hosted the annual workshop to share the latest research findings and future directions. Researchers from multiple universities attended the event.

activities.title: CVPR 2024 论文发表
activities.description: 我们的论文《Multi-Agent Systems in 3D Virtual Worlds》在CVPR 2024上发表，并进行了口头报告。
activities.description_en: Our paper 'Multi-Agent Systems in 3D Virtual Worlds' was published at CVPR 2024 with an oral presentation.

news.title: 实验室成立一周年
news.content: 3DAgentWorldLab成立一周年！感谢所有成员的努力和贡献。
news.content_en: 3DAgentWorldLab celebrates its first anniversary! Thank you to all members for their hard work and contributions.
